CustomField.description: Supplied by UCAS only and only applicable to UK residents applying for undergraduate credit-bearing courses. Stores the Standard Occupational Classification (SOC2010) code for the student if aged 21 or over at the start of their course, or parental occupation code if the student is under 21. Required at entry to a student's Engagement and is not required to be maintained throughout the Engagement.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Supplied by UCAS only and only applicable to UK residents applying for undergraduate credit-bearing courses. Stores the Standard Occupational Classification (SOC2010) code for the student if aged 21 or over at the start of their course, or parental occupation code if the student is under 21. Required at entry to a student's Engagement and is not required to be maintained throughout the Engagement.
CustomField.label: SOC2010
